ext_descriptions.ext_description: A Mating_connector_component is the connector on the next higher assembly with which a connector on the assembly must mate. A Mating_connector_component may be specified in the role of mating_requirement by an .

the placement_context is an inverse relationship that specifies that the existence of the Mating_connector_component is dependent on the existence of the that specifies the Mating_connector_component as its .

the reference_designation specifies the for the Mating_connector_component. The reference_designation specifies the name that serves as the identifier of the location of the Mating_connector_component in the next level of assembly. The reference_designation need not be specified for a particular Mating_connector_component.
the definition specifies the for the Mating_connector_component. The definition specifies the role of either an , a , or a for the Mating_connector_component.

A Mating_connector_placement_relationship is the association between the connector that the interface connector on the assembly must mate with in the next higher assembly, and the resultant placement of that mating connector in the assembly being designed for test and evaluation. The evaluation may include fit checks and evaluation of other material properties. The application of Mating_connector_placement_relationship is limited to three-dimensional geometric systems.
the connector_placement specifies the role of the for the Mating_connector_placement_relationship. The shall be an Axis2_placement_3d.

the interface_context specifies the role of the for the Mating_connector_placement_relationship. The coordinated system of the shape representing the shall be congruent with the coordinate system of the assembly being designed.
the placed_connector specifies the role of the for the Mating_connector_placement_relationship.

A Next_higher_assembly_interface_requirement is the association between the version of the next higher assembly and a shape that simulates the fit characteristics of the next higher assembly. The coordinate system of the shape is congruent with the coordinate system of the current design. The shape simulates a maximum material condition state of the next higher assembly.
the version_of_next_higher_assembly specifies the of the Next_higher_assembly_interface_requirement.
the shape specifies the for the model for the Next_higher_assembly_interface_requirement.
